actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

official_title: To amend the Public Health Service Act with respect to testing pregnant women and newborn infants for infection with the human immunodeficiency virus.
short_title: Women and Children's HIV Protection Act of 2000
subjects: Federal aid to maternal health services

summary.text: Women and Children's HIV Protection Act of 2000 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to prohibit, under subpart I (General Grant Provisions) of part B (Care Grant Program) of title XXVI (Health Care Services Program), making a grant to a State under such part B unless the State demonstrates that the law or regulations of the State require specified testing and services for pregnant women and newborn infants regarding HIV disease.

titles.title: Women and Children's HIV Protection Act of 2000
To amend the Public Health Service Act with respect to testing pregnant women and newborn infants for infection with the human immunodeficiency virus.
